name: CakeWalk (TheShrimpChip)
description:
To download: Install the .rar file provided, extract CakeWalkV1.1 to preferred location. Open the new extracted folder and open "Cakewalk.exe."

Willow Fowler, a witch, was given the task to bake the best
cake for the king and his fiancée for their wedding. Willow starts in
her cottage with portals to take her to gather the rarest ingredients
in the galaxy. Golden milk, the largest dinosaur egg and the finest
sugar for the best wedding cake. 

The way to play the game is by collecting the ingredients and completing the levels. Each
level is based on the three ingredients the player needs in order to bake the best cake for
the royal wedding. Each level also has 3 main characters to complete the tasks. Once all the
tasks are complete, Willow returns to her cottage to whip the ingredients together and
make the royal wedding the best.

• Run
o Left Shift (Keyboard)
o Right trigger (Xbox controller)
• Jump
o Space (Keyboard)
o A (Xbox Controller)
• Aim
o Right Button (Mouse)
o Left Trigger (Xbox controller)
• Dash
o Left Control (Keyboard)
o Left Bumper (Xbox Controller)
• Wall Jump
o Space (Keyboard)
o A (Xbox Controller)
